pma:database.name: Tomorrowdreams
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `Tomorrowdreams` ( `id_Tomorrowdreams` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Pr√©nom` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `Nom` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `E-mail` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `Mobile` text NOT NULL, `date_de_naissance` date NOT NULL, `sexe` varchar(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Femme', `Password` int(11) NOT NULL, `Address` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `Numero` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `Commune` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `Ville` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `Pays` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_Tomorrowdreams`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
